title: Understanding Policies
text: Consider the different types of policies that might influence the choice of mental health screening tools. Think about which policy would be most directly related to the procedures and tools used within a healthcare facility.

title: Focus on Facility Guidelines
text: Facilities often have specific guidelines and policies that dictate the tools and procedures used. These are usually tailored to the needs and resources of the facility.

title: Identify the Correct Policy
text: Which policy is most likely to specify the mental health screening tools to be used in a healthcare setting?
